meanings.sent1: The rainy day matched the dolefulness in her heart.
meanings.sent2: Her dolefulness was evident in the way she hung her head.
meanings.sent3: Despite the dolefulness of the situation, he tried to make her smile.
meanings.sent4: The dolefulness of the melody brought tears to her eyes.
meanings.sent5: The dolefulness of losing her pet was overwhelming.

meanings.definition: Showing or expressing grief or sorrow.
meanings.sent1: His dolefulness expression touched everyone at the funeral.
meanings.sent2: The painting captured the dolefulness of the scene perfectly.
meanings.sent3: Even in his dolefulness, he managed to crack a small joke.
meanings.sent4: The dolefulness in her eyes spoke volumes about her pain.
meanings.sent5: The dolefulness in her voice made it hard to listen without feeling sad.
